spec_data.Name: perl-Text-Glob
spec_data.Description:
Text::Glob implements glob(3) style matching that can be used to match
against text, rather than fetching names from a file-system.  If you
want to do full file globbing use the File::Glob module instead.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:18:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module to match globbing patterns against text
